content.title: Run the App
content.body:
1. From the Live Preview Settings window, select the checkbox next to the Responsive Web.
  2. Under Native, select the checkboxes next to the OS of the mobile/tablet on which you are going to view the app.
    For example- iOS and Android.
  3. Click Save & Run.
    It may take some time for Iris to show the Live Preview is ready window.
